name: The Infected One
description:
Goal: Survive as a Zombie

a. Move mouse to control movement

b. Left click for melee attack

c. Tap SPACE to shoot out arm (you can collect back you arm by walking over it)

1.Kill the soldiers while dodging their bullets

2.Press E to eat the dead bodies to regain health (health is constantly depleting)

3. Dead bodies (if not eaten) become zombie to help you kill soldiers

Art Assets:

https://2dgameartguru.com/top-down-view-zombies/
